---
title: "example_race"
---

The **example_race** dataset contains fictional data for two races.  The dataset is included in order to show the usage of a number of functions.

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(RcappeR)
```

```{r}
data(example_race)
```

The dataset has `r dim(example_race)[1]` rows and `r dim(example_race)[2]` columns.

### Variables

variable | details
---------|--------
date | date of race
time | time race started
pos | finishing position
horse | horse
wintime | winners time
going | official going
code | flat race
btn_l | beaten lengths
dist | race distance
